message: Mornin'. I'm a lumberjack. Do you need some help?

options.lumberjack_giveAxe: Do you have an Axe I could borrow please?
options.lumberjack_useage: Can you remind me how to use an axe?

message: Why yes I do my good man! Here, you can keep it

options.lumberjack_useage: Awesome... How do I use it?

message: To use an axe, walk up to a tree and press 'C' to chop!
